PROVISION OF POSTNATAL CARE TO MOTHERS AND NEWBORNS
RECOMMENDATION 1: Timing of discharge from a health facility after birth
After an uncomplicated vaginal birth in a health facility, healthy mothers and 
newborns should receive care in the facility for at least 24 hours after birth. a 
Weak recommendation based on low 
quality evidence
